abstract: Journal Science issues some of most comprehensive guidelines to date for publication of studies in basic science, calling for clearly defined rules on sharing data and methods; guidelines follow debate over scientific misconduct in wake of scandal surrounding retracted study about ability of researchers to alter perceptions concerning same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: The journal published guidelines on Thursday aimed at reducing scientific misconduct and at making studies easier to check and replicate.

headline.main: Journal Science Releases Guidelines for Publishing Scientific Studies
headline.print_headline: Top Journal Puts Out Comprehensive Guidelines for Publication of Science Studies
